TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeNodeStates extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that represent the possible states of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs> class. For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> event.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the normal node labels. Node tags are specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color.
You can customize most of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag.
In the example, a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> event draws unselected nodes by calling methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs> class. These methods provide the default appearance for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> elements that do not need customization. The handler draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually.
For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> reference topic.
[!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.windows.forms.t_3_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.windows.forms.t_3_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.windows.forms.t_3_1.cs)]
